activities: Amplifier Research archives all emails sent and received via our email domains.  Email may contain personal information. (ex: if an employee emails his supervisor requesting the day off because of a death in the family)  The organization would not use this type of personal information in any way but it would be collected and stored because we cannot separate the personal from work related emails.
